summary: This is an email chain from October 9, 2020, discussing the logistics of obtaining and transferring three 2TB external hard drives (HDs) related to the Epstein case. The communication indicates coordination to ensure no delays in getting the drives to the SDNY (Southern District of New York), given the attention the case is receiving from EM (likely Epstein or Epstein-related matters). One individual is noted as being OCONUS (outside the continental US) the following week on this case.

persons.name: 1MIIMa
persons.context: Writes an email on October 9, 2020, about procuring 2TB external hard drives for the Epstein case, coordinating their delivery, and ensuring updates are copied to others due to an individual being OCONUS.

events.title: Coordination for Hard Drive Transfer to SDNY
events.description: Email correspondence about obtaining three 2TB external hard drives and coordinating their transfer to the SDNY for the Epstein case, emphasizing the need to avoid delays due to the case's high profile.

keyFacts: Three 2TB external hard drives were being procured for the Epstein case on October 9, 2020.
The drives were intended for transfer to the SDNY (Southern District of New York).
The communication stresses the need to avoid delays due to the high-profile attention the case is receiving.
One individual involved was scheduled to be OCONUS (outside the continental US) the following week on this case.
